resources.string: Look-at Clock uses front-facing camera and face detection in order to determined whether or not you are looking at the screen, so it needs permission to access the camera.
Since Look-at Clock uses camera to work, battery life will be affected and camera apps might not work. If you want to turn off Look-at Clock, touch the app\'s notification.
Error while opening the camera. Camera might not be available, or this device doesn\'t have a front-facing camera.
